title: Carrot Idiyappam Recipe - Carrot Noodles Recipe for Toddlers and Kids
content:
Here I have used carrot juice, you can add beetroot juice in this too. I hope you will give this a try and let me know how it turns out for you.

 

Preparation Time: 10 mins

Cooking Time : 3 to 5 mins

Serves: 2

 

Ingredients:

Carrot Juice – 1 cup (juice from 3 carrots)

Roasted Rice Flour or Idiyappam Flour – 3/4 cup

Salt to taste

Ghee – 1 teaspoon

 

Method:

Peel and chop carrots, take it in a blender, add little water and make it into a smooth puree. Strain it and extract 1 cup of carrot juice.

Mix rice flour with salt and set aside.

Take carrot juice in a pan, bring it to a boil. Add in rice flour slowly and mix till it forms into a dough.

Now add in ghee and make it into a dough.

Take it in idiyappam press, squeeze it in a greased steamer plate. Steam this for 3 to 4 mins.

Now remove it and cool it, Separate it and serve.
